alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 8:20PM CST until January 30 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Pickens, Greene and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene and Sumter Counties. Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Marengo, Greene, Hale and Sumter Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and flood warnings remain in effect. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Demopolis Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 68.0 feet, Flooding of lowlands in the area occurs and cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Friday the stage was 63.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Monday morning to a crest of 68.3 feet early Monday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 68.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
